summary: The Devil for His Own
title: The Devil for His Own
body:
read it on the AO3 at http://bit.ly/2VDJPJK

by regencysnuffboxes (malicegeres)

After the End of Time failed to come, there was a rebellion in Hell. This story is its history, more or less.

So, like, what if Hell decided to unionize?

Words: 3602, Chapters: 2/?, Language: English

  • Fandoms: Good Omens - Neil Gaiman & Terry Pratchett
  • Rating: Not Rated
  • Warnings: Creator Chose Not To Use Archive Warnings
  • Categories: M/M
  • Characters: Crowley (Good Omens), Aziraphale (Good Omens), Hastur (Good Omens), Original Demon Character(s)
  • Relationships: Aziraphale/Crowley (Good Omens), Implied Past Crowley/OC
  • Additional Tags: Post-Canon, Labor Unions, Established Relationship, Mentions of Torture But Nothing Graphic, Comrade Crowley, Anyway Guess What We’re Unionizing Hell!, And I’m Still Shitty At Tags!, Podfic Welcome


read it on the AO3 at http://bit.ly/2VDJPJK

blog.name: meltingpenguins
blog.title: Melting Penguins
blog.description:
She/her; They/Them, 34, Whatever, german, potentially kind, hates fake-feminism, Author, Astonishing and high-functioning farrago of balderdash

I do art commissions: COMMISSION INFO

NOTE: If you follow me, drop me an ask answering the following question: What's your favorite superpower?

So I know you are real. Otherwise I will block you.

summary: A Nice And Accurate Place To Visit - Chapter 1 - MeltingPenguins (lilmaibe) - Good Omens - Neil Gaiman & Terry Pratchett...
title: A Nice And Accurate Place To Visit - Chapter 1 - MeltingPenguins (lilmaibe) - Good Omens - Neil Gaiman & Terry Pratchett [Archive of Our Own]
excerpt: An Archive of Our Own, a project of the Organization for Transformative Works
description:
Chapters: 2/?
Fandom: Good Omens - Neil Gaiman & Terry Pratchett, Good Omens (TV)
Rating: Teen And Up Audiences
Warnings: Creator Chose Not To Use Archive Warnings
Characters: Aziraphale (Good Omens), Crowley (Good Omens)
Summary:

Years have passed since the Armageddon’t, and things had been nice.
Till now.
Now Crowley and Aziraphale are called back to London from their cottage, and all too quickly they discover that something worse than the Apocalypse is looming.

The first full chapter is up, the character list gets expanded, the timeline is probably all over the place and Gabriel is a douchecanoe.

Enjoy

blog.name: crowleyandaziraphaleruinedme
blog.title: Queen Davina step on me pls
blog.description: welcome to my hellhome| all we do here is have shitty discussions and cursed posts| yes I am a book person| THEY GAY™

summary: Chapter two: Food and Lost Words
body:
Chapter two: Food and Lost Words

On ao3: here

Aziraphale was well known at the Ritz. The waiters knew him, the receptionist knew him and the chef sent his compliments with the desert.

Crowley finally saw a new side of Aziraphale. Not that Crowley knew a lot of sides of Aziraphale. Well if you don’t count his backside at which Crowley would not so gracefully glance when Aziraphale was walking ahead of him.

Crowley stared at the menu and went blank. He had no idea what to order but thankfully Aziraphale read his mind and ordered sushi for the both of them.

The waiter poured out their wine and Crowley looked around the restaurant, which was quite full with people having their lunch. He turned back towards Aziraphale when something bumped into his chair and ran past him and towards Aziraphale

A small boy, maybe 4 or 5 years old had slipped away from his table and was now fascinated by Aziraphale’s tartan bowtie. His expression was filled with joy and curiosity which made Crowley smile.

Aziraphale’s expression on the other hand was the exact opposite. His eyes had gone wide with confusion and he definitely had no idea how to deal with a human child. Crowley grinned and got up from his seat. He plucked the boy from the floor and placed him on the edge of the table so that he was, to Aziraphale’s dismay, even closer to his bowtie.

Crowley stared with a wide smile as he saw the boy grab the bowtie and Aziraphale freeze at what might the child do next. He had a warm feeling inside him which he couldn’t quite explain but didn’t want to get rid of.

“Y'know, he won’t bite you” Crowley said pulling his chair closer to Aziraphale’s. Aziraphale pursed his lips as the child let go of his bowtie and in a sudden move made a wild grab for Crowley’s sunglasses. Crowley flinched and backed up as the boy’s hand hit his face knocking his sunglasses down to the floor.

Crowley opened his eyes and looked at the pair in front of him. This was the first time Aziraphale had seen Crowley without the sunglasses and he thought of it to be the most beautiful sight he had ever seen. Crowley’s eyes weren’t the regular blue, green or brown but a shining yellow colour which seemed to pierce Aziraphale’s heart. He sat there staring at Crowley with his beautiful eyes and a small smile and felt as if he was sinking deeper into an ocean.

They couldn’t say the same about the young boy though. He was either afraid of Crowley’s eyes or of the consequences he thought he might suffer for knocking down his glasses and swatting him in the face. His joyful expression instantly changed to discomfort and Crowley took that chance to put him back on the floor. The boy scurried back to his parents and Crowley picked up his sunglasses from near Aziraphale’s feet. “Tartan socks. I should’ve known.” he thought to himself and smiled.

He hurriedly put on his glasses and quickly looked around. No one had noticed them. “Great," Crowley thought "think I spooked this one too.”

Aziraphale was still staring at him and Crowley shrank in his seat. Aziraphale broke out of his trance and immediately apologized for staring. Thankfully, the waiter arrived with their sushi and broke the awkward tension between them.

“Why do you always wear those?” Aziraphale asked softly.

“Uh, well, people get freaked out quite a lot,” Crowley muttered, “so I cover ‘em up.”

Aziraphale tilted his head to the side. He let out a small laugh. “I don’t think you should hide those beautiful eyes behind your sunglasses.” He said.

Crowley choked on a piece of fish but immediately covered it up to look like a cough. He drank some wine while Aziraphale ate his own food.

“Thank you” He finally said. Crowley couldn’t believe someone called his eyes beautiful. His brain stopped processing everything else Aziraphale had started saying and kept repeating the same phrase back to back in Aziraphale’s voice.

Aziraphale, however, kept babbling on about how global warming had started to affect the planet to change the topic but he soon realised Crowley wasn’t paying attention. He truly didn’t want to lose Crowley’s friendship over such a trivial compliment. “Well all you did was call his eyes beautiful! It’s not that big of a deal”His thoughts rushed, “he called you angel no less than an hour ago. You’re both even now.”

Slowly they both realised that neither of them was talking to the other. They had just sat there staring at one another and delving into their own thoughts. Neither of them moved because they had no idea how to get out of this situation without making it any more awkward.

Aziraphale decided that an apology would be the simplest way. Crowley decided to continue talking about what Aziraphale was saying. Unfortunately, he had no idea as to what had been said.

“I’m sor-” Aziraphale started.

“So you were talking about your favourite book right?” Crowley interrupted. He winced behind his glasses realising that this was probably not what Aziraphale was talking about and how he could have just said sorry but too late now.

“Ah yes, my dear. I was in the middle of telling you how much I love Shakespeare"  Aziraphale smiled as he grabbed the opportunity to change the subject and make Crowley feel more at ease.

Crowley relaxed in his chair and grinned as Aziraphale rambled about Othello and Hamlet and all of Shakespeare’s plays. Crowley paid attention to every word this time. Well not every word, he sometimes got lost in Aziraphale’s sweet voice and miss out on a few sentences, but he tried his best to pay his full attention.

Aziraphale on the other hand was happily analysing all of Shakespeare’s works and somewhere in the midst of his rambles he realised that he might be boring Crowley to death. However, one glance at his companion told him that Crowley was one of, if not the only person who liked listening to what Aziraphale had to say.

And that’s how the pair spent their day. One listening to the other passionately talk about something they liked. One silently sipping wine and nodding at parts where they agreed with the other. And both of them having a great long debate discussion about a matter they both were passionate about.

Well not every word, he sometimes got lost in Aziraphale’s sweet voice and miss out on a few sentences, but he tried his best to pay his full attention.

Aziraphale on the other hand was happily analysing all of Shakespeare’s works and somewhere in the midst of his rambles he realised that he might be boring Crowley to death. However, one glance at his companion told him that Crowley was one of, if not the only person who liked listening to what Aziraphale had to say.

Crowley’s eyes weren’t the regular blue, green or brown but a shining yellow colour which seemed to pierce Aziraphale’s heart. He sat there staring at Crowley with his beautiful eyes and a small smile and felt as if he was sinking deeper into an ocean.

They couldn’t say the same about the young boy though. He was either afraid of Crowley’s eyes or of the consequences he thought he might suffer for knocking down his glasses and swatting him in the face. His joyful expression instantly changed to discomfort and Crowley took that chance to put him back on the floor. The boy scurried back to his parents and Crowley picked up his sunglasses from near Aziraphale’s feet. “Tartan socks. I should’ve known.” he thought to himself and smiled.

He hurriedly put on his glasses and quickly looked around. No one had noticed them. “Great," Crowley thought "think I spooked this one too.”

Aziraphale was still staring at him and Crowley shrank in his seat. Aziraphale broke out of his trance and immediately apologized for staring. Thankfully, the waiter arrived with their sushi and broke the awkward tension between them.

“Why do you always wear those?” Aziraphale asked softly.

“Uh, well, people get freaked out quite a lot,” Crowley muttered, “so I cover ‘em up.”

Aziraphale tilted his head to the side. He let out a small laugh. “I don’t think you should hide those beautiful eyes behind your sunglasses.” He said.

Crowley choked on a piece of fish but immediately covered it up to look like a cough. He drank some wine while Aziraphale ate his own food.

“Thank you” He finally said. Crowley couldn’t believe someone called his eyes beautiful. His brain stopped processing everything else Aziraphale had started saying and kept repeating the same phrase back to back in Aziraphale’s voice.

Aziraphale, however, kept babbling on about how global warming had started to affect the planet to change the topic but he soon realised Crowley wasn’t paying attention. He truly didn’t want to lose Crowley’s friendship over such a trivial compliment. “Well all you did was call his eyes beautiful! It’s not that big of a deal”His thoughts rushed, “he called you angel no less than an hour ago. You’re both even now.”

Slowly they both realised that neither of them was talking to the other. They had just sat there staring at one another and delving into their own thoughts. Neither of them moved because they had no idea how to get out of this situation without making it any more awkward.

Aziraphale decided that an apology would be the simplest way. Crowley decided to continue talking about what Aziraphale was saying. Unfortunately, he had no idea as to what had been said.

“I’m sor-” Aziraphale started.

“So you were talking about your favourite book right?” Crowley interrupted. He winced behind his glasses realising that this was probably not what Aziraphale was talking about and how he could have just said sorry but too late now.

“Ah yes, my dear. I was in the middle of telling you how much I love Shakespeare"  Aziraphale smiled as he grabbed the opportunity to change the subject and make Crowley feel more at ease.

Crowley relaxed in his chair and grinned as Aziraphale rambled about Othello and Hamlet and all of Shakespeare’s plays. Crowley paid attention to every word this time. Well not every word, he sometimes got lost in Aziraphale’s sweet voice and miss out on a few sentences, but he tried his best to pay his full attention.

Aziraphale on the other hand was happily analysing all of Shakespeare’s works and somewhere in the midst of his rambles he realised that he might be boring Crowley to death. However, one glance at his companion told him that Crowley was one of, if not the only person who liked listening to what Aziraphale had to say.

And that’s how the pair spent their day. One listening to the other passionately talk about something they liked. One silently sipping wine and nodding at parts where they agreed with the other. And both of them having a great long debate discussion about a matter they both were passionate about.

blog.title: Supernatural Imagines and One Shots
blog.description:
You stumbled upon the small black and white blog, your eyes darting from the gif of Sam Winchester to the paused-while-talking Dean icon before finally settling on the title of the blog. "Supernatural imagines and one shots," you read, your gaze dropping lower and toward the description, where you found an amusing tale of what you had just done. This was certainly something to investigate.

———

Hey, guys! I'm Priscila and I write fanfiction and stuff. I especially love fluffiness but I also like angst. Please leave a *~* for imagine requests! 😊

Requests for ONE SHOTS are CLOSED

summary: Hey beautiful may I request anything with Crowley and plus size reader? 🙏❤️
question: Hey beautiful may I request anything with Crowley and plus size reader? 🙏❤️
answer:
“Stop feeling yourself, Moose, I could be out of here any second if I really wanted to,” Crowley spat, glaring at the man standing in front of him. 

“Then why are you still here?” Sam fired back, giving a pointed look to the shackles around the demon’s wrists. He’d been trying to get info out of him for hours, but nothing had succeeded. 

“You have something I want,” Crowley said, smirking. His eyes landed on you, quietly observing from the corner. 

The look he gave you was nothing like the hateful, narrowing faces he’d shown Sam. It was teasing, cornering. Sinful. A deep heat bloomed on your cheeks before you could stop it. You weren’t used to those looks, not the way that he seemed to undress you with his eyes, lips pulled softly into a devious smile. 

You looked away, pulling your jacket tighter around you. 

“Don’t do that, love, I’d rather see everything,” Crowley winked. 

“Wait, Y/N?” Sam said, turning to look at you. “Never. It’s not happening.”

“Continue torturing me then, Sammy. We know how well that’s going. Or make a deal.”

blog.name: compassioninfashion
blog.title: Compassion in Fashion
blog.description: A married cis Lizbian (married to Liz) and LGBT+ ally; she/her pronouns. A mom to 7 kitties, foster mom to a rescued kitty (for now) with 3 - 6 more feral felines (outdoor strays) under my care...depending on the day.  A self-employed writer, editor and photographer. An animal lover, environmentalist, vegetarian and always aspiring vegan. A lover of all things vintage, kitsch, Disney, Star Wars, Marvel, Supernatural and more...  May the force be with you!

summary: The Supernatural A-to-Z :: C is for Crowley by leighanned for Compassion in Fashion  Hello Darlings... Moose. Squirrel.  Before...
caption:
The Supernatural A-to-Z :: C is for Crowley
by leighanned for Compassion in Fashion

Hello Darlings… Moose. Squirrel.

Before Polyvore shut down in 2018, I began and nearly completed outfits based on the Supernatural alphabet and had completed A through T. Now, with the final season looming in the future, I thought I’d go ahead and share them and am thinking of completing the remainder of the alphabet via ShopLook.io.

When the Polyvore site shut down, I gained access to all of my completed ensembles but lost the links to the animal-friendly clothing items and accessories used in the outfits, so I hadn’t posted the series.

I thoroughly enjoyed creating them and think they’re pretty cool (myself). While I can’t provide the specifics of each item used in the outfits, I can affirm that they are all natural plant-based or man-made materials (no real leather, suede, wool, silk, fur, animal-tested beauty products).

Even without links to specific products assembled in these sets, I hope they serve as inspiration for looks you could re-create to celebrate this amazing show by finding your own animal-friendly, cruelty-free products.

I just want to be loved… If you like this set or enjoyed this series, show me a little love, won’t you?

summary: List of things Crowley does in the internet era
title: List of things Crowley does in the internet era
body:
- creates malware that make your screen freeze and play obnoxious music over and over 
- makes all the “Nigerian Prince in need of money” emails
- created chain emails
- created Blingee 
- is behind every new conspiracy theory ( especially proud of the reptilian one as he used a video of himself as an inspiration )
- always suggests new stupid challenges for teenagers like the tide pods things
- pop up ads windows - angry Steam reviews
- angry YouTube comments
- makes good Yelp reviews for very bad places
- bought domain names for many random things to prevent people from getting them for their businesses
- edits Wikipedia articles to add tiny bits of misinformation that are very hard to notice
- tone polices people on Twitter
- is obviously the one who told Adobe to make the previous versions of their softwares unavailable for users who bought them
- was the first one to suggest brand mascots should be on Twitter
- Tumblr ( just Tumblr, that’s all Crowley’s fault, all of it )
- gives terrible advice on Quora and Yahoo
- gives five stars to products that are of very bad quality
- didn’t create rickrolling but claims that he did
- still uploads movies in ten parts of 7 minutes each on YouTube
- starts arguments on FB
- has an army of bots that is constantly saturating governements and administration website so users can’t use them
- hacks people’s bank and Amazon accounts sometimes and with their money, he buys them tons of Garfield merch that he sends to their adress

summary: Shibari and the Serpent
title: Shibari and the Serpent
body:
read it on the AO3 at http://bit.ly/2VI08Ka

by The_Bentley

“Angel!”

“Hush now or I’ll have to gag you.  I’m almost done.”

“Yeah, that’s going to happen,” said Crowley sarcastically.

His eyes widened as a black ball gag with leather strap was dangled in front of him, Aziraphale smiling in the most self-satisfied way possible.  The thing was thrown on his chest.  Just a little reminder.

“Don’t tempt me,” his angel whispered seductively in his ear. 

Words: 1924, Chapters: 1/1, Language: English

read it on the AO3 at http://bit.ly/2VI08Ka

by The_Bentley

“Angel!”

“Hush now or I’ll have to gag you.  I’m almost done.”

“Yeah, that’s going to happen,” said Crowley sarcastically.

His eyes widened as a black ball gag with leather strap was dangled in front of him, Aziraphale smiling in the most self-satisfied way possible.  The thing was thrown on his chest.  Just a little reminder.

“Don’t tempt me,” his angel whispered seductively in his ear.

blog.name: ygrain-synaerasis
blog.title: L'Echappée Belle d' Ygraïn
blog.description:
" Elle voulait une vie d'aventures, une vie folle, une vie plus grande qu'elle.Et l'on disait tout autour d'elle : [Ygraïn] rêve". Timothée de Fombelle, Victoria rêve

Je ne sais pas dessiner, les artworks que vous verrez ici ne sont pas les miens. Mais vous trouverez toujours un lien vers une gallerie de leurs auteurs. Personnellement, je ne fais que des montages (wallpaper, digiscrap, bannière ...) à partir de captures d'écran (screencap).. Ce tumblr est ma gallerie de rêves éphémères, mon échappée belle où je viens me ressourcer, me changer les idées, trouver un support à mes rêveries grâce aux fabuleux arts de d'autres artistes. .
Pour me contacter, en cas de problème: ygrain@gmail.com

Sinon: mon blog de lecture est: https://les-lectures-d-ygrain.tumblr.com/
